column2: UPDATE IBANX_PREFERENCE SET PREFKEY = 'logevent.action.event.type' WHERE PREFKEY = 'shift.action.event.type'

column1: ## change acl names to strict use of naming regime

column4: IBANX_LIFECYCLE AS LC SET ACL.NAME = CONCAT('StateAcl '\
column7: STATE.NAME) WHERE ACL.ID = STATE.STATE_ACL_ID AND STATE.LIFECYCLE_ID = LC.ID

column2: MERGE INTO IBANX_ACL N_ACL USING (SELECT ACL.ID ID\
column8: IBANX_LIFECYCLE LC WHERE ACL.ID = STATE.STATE_ACL_ID AND STATE.LIFECYCLE_ID = LC.ID) T_ACL ON (N_ACL.ID = T_ACL.ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET N_ACL.NAME = T_ACL.NEW_NAME

column2: UPDATE IBANX_ACL SET NAME = 'StateAcl ' + LC.NR + '-' + STATE.NAME FROM IBANX_ACL ACL\
column4: IBANX_LIFECYCLE LC WHERE ACL.ID = STATE.STATE_ACL_ID AND STATE.LIFECYCLE_ID = LC.ID
